steps.plaintext: Search for source of the strange voice
steps.markdown: Search for source of the strange voice

substeps.plaintext: "Shousei" will appear on the path with gates and can be found immediately. After following it, it will turn into a torch. Light the torch to reveal the tanuki.
substeps.markdown: ◀"Shousei"▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/%22Shousei%22▷ will appear on the path with gates and can be found immediately. After following it, it will turn into a torch. Light the torch to reveal the tanuki.

substeps.plaintext: "Kichiboushi" appears as a barrel on a rock next to a group of hilichurls and can be found immediately. Paimon will make a comment about the hilichurls. Defeating the hilichurls is not required.
substeps.markdown: ◀"Kichiboushi"▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/%22Kichiboushi%22▷ appears as a barrel on a rock next to a group of hilichurls and can be found immediately. Paimon will make a comment about the hilichurls. Defeating the hilichurls is not required.

substeps.plaintext: "Gyoubu Koban" is sitting on a rock along the forest path and can only be found after at least one of the other tanuki are found. Following it will lead to three torches. Light the westernmost torch to reveal the tanuki.
substeps.markdown: ◀"Gyoubu Koban"▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/%22Gyoubu_Koban%22▷ is sitting on a rock along the forest path and can only be found after at least one of the other tanuki are found. Following it will lead to three torches. Light the westernmost torch to reveal the tanuki.

steps.plaintext: Head to the location of the barrier
steps.markdown: Head to the location of the barrier

substeps.plaintext: Adjust the lanterns according to the figure on the gate. Both lanterns up next to the gate should be adjusted to 2. The lantern further in the cave behind the root on the ground should be adjusted to 3. The lantern on the ground close to the Pray lantern should be adjusted to 4.
substeps.markdown: Adjust the lanterns according to the figure on the gate. Both lanterns up next to the gate should be adjusted to 2. The lantern further in the cave behind the root on the ground should be adjusted to 3. The lantern on the ground close to the Pray lantern should be adjusted to 4.
